title: Apple TV+ series ‘The Afterparty’ adds Ken Jeong as regular on Season 2
content:
Apple TV+ murder mystery comedy The Afterparty has added Actor-comedian Ken Jeong to its second season. Jeong will be a new series regular and joins the high-profile cast of Elizabeth Perkins, Zach Woods, Anna Konkle, and Vivian Wu, among others. 

more…
